title.rendered: NEW VIDEO: Abrams for Governor Highlights Success of “One Georgia” Tour

content.rendered:
Abrams concluded tour this week after traveling across state to discuss plans to expand Medicaid, create jobs and fully fund education

ATLANTA – Today, the Abrams for Governor campaign released a new recap video featuring press coverage and highlights from the “One Georgia” tour. The tour began last Monday in Cuthbert and made stops in Warner Robins, Atlanta, Columbus, Albany, Thomasville, Midway, Statesboro, and Augusta before concluding this week in Athens. During each stop, Abrams heard from and spoke with Georgians — discussing her plans to expand Medicaid, create jobs and fully fund education. 

Watch the “One Georgia” tour recap video below:

###
